name: Police Sniper Shooter
description:
Ready to shoot? Shooting the prisoners while they are escaping from jail is your mission in Police Sniper Shooter game.

Police Sniper Prisoner Escape Features:
• Eliminate Prisoners trying to Make a Breakout
•Harness you sniper skills and become the greatest sniper to defeat the enemies.
• Highly Additive & Immersive Gameplay
• Realistic graphics & gameplay controls
